main event: An unusual aerial phenomenon was sighted near Gonzales, Texas in October 1951, described as a round disc-shaped object that made a sharp turn and accelerated rapidly.
interesting points: The object was reported to be luminous and larger than typical aircraft,The observation was made by experienced and reliable witnesses,The object hovered briefly before disappearing rapidly,No known aircraft were present in the area at the time of the sighting,The object moved silently with no visible trail.
sighted object: one round or disc-shaped luminous object
witness description: reliable citizens of Gonzales, Texas including Mrs. J.B. Gonzalez and her husband, and a sheriff who knew them
